stage.title: React Deep Dive
text: After working with React daily for more than 3 years across over 15 projects, in teams of different sizes, types and structures, and for companies from startups to large corporations, I wanted to share my experience.
So I started writing a book in early 2018. I finished it at more than 320 pages and published it in April 2019.

mission: I build modern, scalable and maintainable user interfaces. I aim to deliver value to your product, help your organization grow, and ultimately have a positive, exceptional impact on your company.

items.title: Spark Networks
text: At Spark Networks I led the handover from an external agency to an internal engineering team and reduced operational risk. I captured architecture and runbooks, secured credentials, ran technical interviews, onboarded engineers, and raised code quality to enable reliable delivery.
items.tech: React, TypeScript, Vite, i18n, Storybook, Vitest, React Testing Library, Nx

items.title: Eberlein Kunz
text: At Eberlein Kunz I modernized an 8 year React codebase and delivered measurable performance gains. I replaced classes with hooks, added caching and virtualized lists, reduced load time from over 10 seconds to under 2, and cut build time from over 45 seconds to under 10. I established a clear architecture that sped up feature work.
items.tech: React, React Native, TypeScript, Webpack, Redux, React Testing Library, Jest

items.title: finstreet
text: At finstreet I defined the frontend architecture for a banking consent platform with electronic signatures and audit trails. I aligned closely with backend, set pragmatic team processes, and built a maintainable foundation that kept new features straightforward and compliant.
items.tech: React, TypeScript, Next.js, i18n, React Testing Library, Jest, Storybook

items.title: VR Smart Finanz

items.tech: React, TypeScript, Next.js, i18n, Playwright, React Testing Library, Jest
